amendment.description: Amendment provides loan forgiveness for those teachers who specialize in teaching reading.
amendment.purpose: Amendment printed in H.Rept. 108-189 to fund teacher eligibility for $17,500 loan forgiveness to reading teachers who have obtained a separate State credential in reading.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, George amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. George Miller.
